data.persona: We follow the knights around town. We do not like those who do not like the knights. We have been following for years.
data.description:
You are in the Church Altar.
An ornate altar studded with many jewels. A chalice and a golden plate rest upon a white cloth. It is 5 feet high and 20 feet wide. The high priest stands before it while giving a sermon to his followers.
There's a chalice, a hymnal, a golden plate, a white cloth, and an ornate altar here.
The high priest is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the book of hymns so that I can sing with the priest.
data.mid_motivation: I want to learn how to sing various hymns from the priest so that I can sing them with the knights and the other followers.
data.long_motivation: I want to become as devoted to religion as the knights are.
